name: Annual audit or financial review
text: §302D-32  Annual audit or financial review.  Each charter school shall annually complete an independent financial audit that complies with the requirements of its authorizer and the department; provided that the authorizer shall have the discretion to allow a financial review in lieu of an independent financial audit. [L 2013, c 159, pt of §1; am L 2014, c 99, §22]
